Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie *De Dana Dan*?
Options:
A. The flood scene in De Dana Dan was completed in 15 days.
B. Priyadarshan directed the movie De Dana Dan.
C. Akshay Kumar starred in De Dana Dan.
D. The flood scene was a significant part of the movie.
Answer: The flood scene in De Dana Dan was completed in 15 days., Priyadarshan directed the movie De Dana Dan.
